response.original_title: the blood of horses never dries
response.overview: "the blood of horses never dries" (2023) is an experimental film inspired by the poem 'The Horse Fell Off the Poem' by Palestinian poet, Mahmoud Darwish. When love, nature, and war collide, poetry and dance emerge to honour the innocent blood shed in search and longing of freedom; blood which will never dry but will eternally stain the heart.
response.title: the blood of horses never dries
